title: World-Wide
text:
---

The Democratic and Republican parties are weighing the political impact of the prospect of the Supreme Court overturning Roe v. Wade as they look ahead to midterm elections.

---

The FDA limited the use of the Covid-19 vaccine from Johnson & Johnson after reviewing the risk of life-threatening blood clots.

---

The WHO estimated that nearly 15 million people had died from causes related to the coronavirus pandemic by the end of 2021.

---

The level of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere reached a record high in April, according to measurements at an observatory on Hawaii's Mauna Loa volcano.

---

A suspected terrorist attack in central Israel killed at least three people and injured several others, rattling the country as it celebrated independence day.

---

U.S. Indian Health Service hospitals in the Dakotas have faced delays in obtaining life-saving equipment.

---

Suspected Colombian drug kingpin Dairo Antonio Usuga was arraigned in a New York federal court.
